name: 告死天使复仇之夜 Death Angel Nightmare
name_original: 告死天使复仇之夜 Death Angel Nightmare
description:
Tips:
This game is a terror game, with elements such as violence, murder, blood and intimidation. Players who are uncomfortable with this should consider it or play with others. Otherwise, the author will not be responsible for the consequences.

This work is the third in the series of "Dead Angel"：Nightmare. Matsushita and Taojing are an affectionate couple of high school students, but they fell into a strange situation after a date one day.
After Panasonic sent out a distress message, there was no sound, and Taojing was involved in the pursuit of death. Sudden pursuers, night of escape... Why is this? What went wrong?

Game type: Terror puzzle solving/plot exploration
Game duration: within 2 hours
Game ending: single ending, but there are many kinds of death achievements collected.
How to operate: move with the direction key, run with shift, and pop up the menu with the Esc and X keys. Full screen and full mouse operation are available.
Archiving mode: automatic archiving and manual archiving of items consumed.
